alert.note: Alert for Cobb; DeKalb; Fulton; Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:28PM EDT until June 17 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern DeKalb County in north central Georgia... East central Cobb County in north central Georgia... Southwestern Gwinnett County in north central Georgia... Northeastern Fulton County in north central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Roswell, or 11 miles east of Marietta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Lawrenceville, Decatur, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Dunwoody, Duluth, Suwanee, Lilburn, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Clarkston, Berkeley Lake, Tucker, North Decatur, North Atlanta and North Druid Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
